channel.title: Pre-EOC Client and Server?
channel.description: Hi. I'm looking for a client and server from the day before eoc. I don't want any modifications on it, just like the real runescape. Where can I find this? I want to be able to play the game single-player. Thanks again.

item.title: Pre-EOC Client and Server?
item.dc:creator: @jack332 jack332
item.description:
@jack332 wrote:

i don’t think you will get it due to people which are selling it alot to make profit but still, no one got real runescape source/client, but there is a source called rune-reborn, its almost same as rs, but links are down

Read full topic
